results.title: Simvastatin may improve myocardial perfusion abnormality in slow coronary flow.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may improve @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Defects_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006330 @@@myocardial perfusion abnormality@@@ in slow coronary flow.

citations.NLM: Cakmak M, Tanriverdi H, Cakmak N, Evrengul H, Cetemen S, Kuru O. Simvastatin may improve myocardial perfusion abnormality in slow coronary flow. Cardiology. 2008;110(1):39-44. PMID: 17934268

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates pulmonary vascular remodelling by down-regulating matrix metalloproteinase-1 and -9 expression in a carotid artery-jugular vein shunt pulmonary hypertension model in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may play a role in the treatment of systemic-pulmonary shunt-induced @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH diseases@@@, such as @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Defects_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006330 @@@congenital heart disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Yao J, Xiong M, Tang B, Chen G, Liang M, Ma X, Wang Z, Wu Z. Simvastatin attenuates pulmonary vascular remodelling by down-regulating matrix metalloproteinase-1 and -9 expression in a carotid artery-jugular vein shunt pulmonary hypertension model in rats. Eur J Cardiothorac Surg. 2012 Nov;42(5):e121-7. PMID: 23087098
